name: get-merchants-merchantId-paymentMethodSettings-paymentMethodId
description:
Returns details for the merchant account and the payment method identified in the path.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”Payment methods read

merchantId.description: The unique identifier of the merchant account.

paymentMethodId.description: The unique identifier of the payment method.

$ul: **afterpayTouch**
**supportUrl**: Support Url
**allowed**: Indicates whether receiving payments is allowed. This value is set to **true** by Adyen after screening your merchant account.
**applePay**
**domains**: The list of merchant domains. Maximum: 99 domains per request.
**bcmc**
**enableBcmcMobile**: Indicates if [Bancontact mobile](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/bancontact/bancontact-mobile) is enabled.
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)

**businessLineId**: The unique identifier of the business line. Required if you have a [platform setup](https://docs.adyen.com/marketplaces-and-platforms/platform-structure-resources/platform-setup/).
**cartesBancaires**
**siret**: Cartes Bancaires SIRET. Format: 14 digits.
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**clearpay**
**supportUrl**: Support Url
**countries**: The list of countries where a payment method is available. By default, all countries supported by the payment method.
**cup**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**currencies**: The list of currencies that a payment method supports. By default, all currencies supported by the payment method.
**customRoutingFlags**: The list of custom routing flags to route payment to the intended acquirer.
**diners**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**discover**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**eftpos_australia**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**enabled**: Indicates whether the payment method is enabled (**true**) or disabled (**false**).
**giroPay**
**supportEmail**: The email address of merchant support.
**girocard**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**googlePay**
**merchantId**: Google Pay [Merchant ID](https://support.google.com/paymentscenter/answer/7163092?hl=en). Character length and limitations: 16 alphanumeric characters or 20 numeric characters.
**reuseMerchantId**: Indicates whether the Google Pay Merchant ID is used for several merchant accounts. Default value: **false**.
**id**: The identifier of the resource.
**ideal**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**interac_card**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**jcb**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**klarna**
**autoCapture**: Indicates the status of [Automatic capture](https://docs.adyen.com/online-payments/capture#automatic-capture). Default value: **false**.
**disputeEmail**: The email address for disputes.
**region**: The region of operation. For example, **NA**, **EU**, **CH**, **AU**.
**supportEmail**: The email address of merchant support.
**maestro**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
**mealVoucher_FR**
**conecsId**: Meal Voucher conecsId. Format: digits only
**siret**: Meal Voucher siret. Format: 14 digits.
**subTypes**: The list of additional payment methods. Allowed values: **mealVoucher_FR_edenred**, **mealVoucher_FR_groupeup**, **mealVoucher_FR_natixis**, **mealVoucher_FR_sodexo**.
**paypal**

**directCapture**: Indicates if direct (immediate) capture for PayPal is enabled. If set to **true**, this setting overrides the [capture](https://docs.adyen.com/online-payments/capture) settings of your merchant account. Default value: **true**.
**payerId**: PayPal Merchant ID. Character length and limitations: 13 single-byte alphanumeric characters.
**subject**: Your business email address.
**reference**: Your reference for the payment method. Supported characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9.
**shopperInteraction**: The sales channel.
**sofort**
**currencyCode**: Sofort currency code. For example, **EUR**.
**logo**: Sofort logo. Format: Base64-encoded string.
**storeIds**: The unique identifier of the store for which to configure the payment method, if any.
**swish**
**swishNumber**: Swish number. Format: 10 digits without spaces. For example, **1231111111**.
**twint**
**logo**: Twint logo. Format: Base64-encoded string.
**type**: Payment method [variant](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/paymentmethodvariant#management-api).
**verificationStatus**: Payment method status. Possible values:
**vipps**
**logo**: Vipps logo. Format: Base64-encoded string.
**subscriptionCancelUrl**: Vipps subscription cancel url (required in case of [recurring payments](https://docs.adyen.com/online-payments/tokenization))
**visa**
**transactionDescription**
**doingBusinessAsName**: The text to be shown on the shopper's bank statement.
**type**: The type of transaction description you want to use: (default: dynamic)
